name: Demon God(Global)
description:
Demon God is an epic idle MMORPG where you could change your fate. To be a God or a Demon? It's all up to you. Train your characters with different classes, team up in dungeons and battle fearsome Demons! Embark on this immortal journey now!

--CLAIM RICH REWARDS FOR FREE--
Free VIP 10 for you after you created a role.

--MAKE POWERFUL COMBOS--
You will get excellent visual performance and super exciting battle scenes here.

--DEFEAT DUNGEON BOSSES--
You can obtain 5-star Sacred Gears by killing Bosses in Divine Realm, Mirage, Pagoda and many other Dungeons!Let's defeat the strongest dungeon bosses!

--UNIQUE OUTFIT COMBINATION--
Cool fashion, unique weapon. All you want is here.

--SELECT LEGENDARY CLASSES--
Demon or God? You decide whether you will be born. Choose your partner during the journey!

FB: https://www.facebook.com/gaming/DemonGodGlobal
CS: likedreamstar.cs@ijunhai.com
